data.description: Offers a general primer on large-scale policies directed by US federal and state governments, with specific examples in pressing policy areas. Takes existing policies and the policy process as a given, explains them in detail, and puts a policy focus on very specific contemporary questions of concern to policymakers. Gain a broad overall knowledge of how the majority of state and federal funding is spent and the policy outcomes associated with that spending.
data.title: CONTEMPORARY PUBLIC POLICY ISSUES

data.description: Provides opportunities to engage in research on public policy issues and possible solutions.
data.title: WORKSHOP IN PUBLIC POLICY
